attributes.action: Ensure the Commonwealth Office has a immigration/emigration help pack
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Anyone immigrating or emigrating to or from the U.K. or any other country is faced with a logistics nightmare.e.g. what forms do I need,what laws do I have to comply with,where do I get relevant forms and information.
My petition is for a simpler way to immigrate/emigrate by the provision of a pack containing all of the relevant information,addresses,forms,telephone numbers and an itinerary stating how,  when, and in a logical order to complete certain actions.
This would save the cost of many staff at the commonwealth office/British Embassy and other countries embassy officials time and ensure that all immigrants/emigrants have complied with all legal requirements and smooth what is a very stressful effort.
The packs could be linked to other packs from HMRC
customs and excise etc
